member.name: T:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode
member.summary: Provides a replacement for the TypeCode enum, which is missing in .NETStandard 1.0.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Empty
member.summary: 0. A null reference.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Object
member.summary: 1. A general type representing any reference or value type not explicitly represented by another TypeCode.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.DBNull
member.summary: 2. A database null (column) value.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Boolean
member.summary: 3. A simple type representing Boolean values of true or false.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Char
member.summary: 4. An integral type representing unsigned 16-bit integers with values between 0 and 65535. The set of possible values for the System.TypeCode.Char type corresponds to the Unicode character set.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.SByte
member.summary: 5. An integral type representing signed 8-bit integers with values between -128 and 127.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Byte
member.summary: 6. An integral type representing unsigned 8-bit integers with values between 0 and 255.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Int16
member.summary: 7. An integral type representing signed 16-bit integers with values between -32768 and 32767.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.UInt16
member.summary: 8. An integral type representing unsigned 16-bit integers with values between 0 and 65535.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Int32
member.summary: 9. An integral type representing signed 32-bit integers with values between -2147483648 and 2147483647.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.UInt32
member.summary: 10. An integral type representing unsigned 32-bit integers with values between 0 and 4294967295.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Int64
member.summary: 11. An integral type representing signed 64-bit integers with values between -9223372036854775808 and 9223372036854775807.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.UInt64
member.summary: 12. An integral type representing unsigned 64-bit integers with values between 0 and 18446744073709551615.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Single
member.summary: 13. A floating point type representing values ranging from approximately 1.5 x 10 -45 to 3.4 x 10 38 with a precision of 7 digits.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Double
member.summary: 14. A floating point type representing values ranging from approximately 5.0 x 10 -324 to 1.7 x 10 308 with a precision of 15-16 digits.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.Decimal
member.summary: 15. A simple type representing values ranging from 1.0 x 10 -28 to approximately 7.9 x 10 28 with 28-29 significant digits.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.DateTime
member.summary: 16. A type representing a date and time value.

member.name: F:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.NetStandardTypeCode.String
member.summary: 18. A sealed class type representing Unicode character strings.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.PropertyExtensionsPolyfill.GetAccessors(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns an array whose elements reflect the public and, if specified, non-public get, set, and other accessors of the property reflected by the current instance.
member.param: The property for which to make the determination.
Whether non-public methods should be returned in the MethodInfo array: true if non-public methods should be included; otherwise false. Defaults to false if not supplied.
member.returns: An array of System.Reflection.MethodInfo objects whose elements reflect the get, set, and other accessors of the property reflected by the current instance. If is true, this array contains public and non-public get, set, and other accessors. If is false, this array contains only public get, set, and other accessors. If no accessors with the specified visibility are found, this method returns an empty array.

member.name: M:AgileObjects.NetStandardPolyfills.PropertyExtensionsPolyfill.GetGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the public or non-public get accessor for this .
member.param: The property for which to retrieve the accessor.
Whether a non-public get accessor should be returned: true if a non-public accessor should be returned, otherwise false.
member.returns: A MethodInfo representing the get accessor for this , if is true. Returns null if is false and the get accessor is non-public, or if is true but no get accessors exist.

member.returns: A MethodInfo representing the set accessor for this , if is true. Returns null if is false and the set accessor is non-public, or if is true but no set accessors exist.

The Type to compare with the current type.
member.returns: True if the and the current represent the same type, or if the current is in the inheritance hierarchy of the , or if the current is an interface that the implements, or if the is a generic type parameter and the current represents one of its constraints. False if none of these conditions are true, or if the is null.
